name: The Comedian (Xorclev)
description:
Have you ever wanted to go out onto a stage, to take the microphone in hand and see if you could make an audience laugh?  If you have, then this is the game for you!  Play as a young comedian desperate to improve your situation by telling jokes.  However, you live in a different type of world where hecklers will not only make fun of you on stage, they'll leap up and attack you!  Discover the nuances of telling a good joke and how to win over an audience in THE COMEDIAN!

Features:
-Tell a number of original jokes ranging from a variety of topics
-Battle hecklers using the Insult/Roast combat method
-Play as a boy or a girl comedian
-Get comedic tips from your manager
-Experience a compelling story about a motherless child trying to win over a wayward father
-Invite non-player characters to attend your shows
-Learn new jokes as you interact with the people in your town
-Fill up the "laugh-o-meter" to prove you are the funniest
-Keep an eye on the Time Meter or you'll get booted off the stage
-Find treasure scattered throughout a modern RPG setting
-Play the Antonym Game and win a rare prize!
-Forget about shops, buy items from vending machines in town!
